value: name=Mount St. Helens Forest Learning Center

content=The Forest Learning Center is located inside the blast zone of the May 18, 1980 eruption of Mount St. Helens on Highway 504 and open mid-May through late October. It is a partnership between Weyerhaeuser Company, Washington State Department of Transportation and the Rocky Mountain Elk Foundation. The center features exhibits including a lifelike forest, eruption chamber, movie theater, and virtual helicopter tour and a large gift store.
content=Fire Mountain Grill at Hoffstadt Bluffs offers family friendly dining, great service, and fantastic food.
content=Rustic riverview dining in a family style setting.  Featuring gourmet burgers, sandwhiches, salads, and homemade fruit cobblers.
